snippet.title: PICOMIN - 7 Minutes of gameplay
snippet.description:
PICOMIN is a demake of Nintendo's 'Pikmin' RTS series. Control an army of plant-like creatures in a journey to retrieve the missing parts of your ship's computer. This is 7 minutes of unedited, commentary-free footage from the first few in-game days.
A demo is scheduled for release on Friday, December 27, 2019.
Check it out on itch: https://gunturtle.itch.io/picomin
Follow my Twitter: https://twitter.com/GunTurtle
